data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lelej, Arkady S., Loktionov, Valery M. (2009): Review of the Evagetes crassicornis species-group (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae), with description of new species. Zootaxa 2230: 42-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190285
